<script>
      function tabCallback(domId) {
        // Report the interaction when users click on any tab
        
        var html =  new Array();
      }
      
      var tabs = new _IG_Tabs();
      tabs.addTab('News', {
        tooltip: 'Click here to read news about Google',
        callback: tabCallback
      });
      tabs.addTab('Videos', {
        tooltip: 'Click here to see videos',
        callback: tabCallback
      });
      tabs.addTab('Images', {
        tooltip: 'View images here',
        callback: tabCallback
      });
      tabs.addTab('Other', {
        tooltip: 'See other content here',
        callback: tabCallback
      });
      
      var tabs_arr = tabs.getTabs();
      for (var n = 0; n < tabs_arr; n++) {
        tabs_arr[n].getNameContainer().onclick = _IG_Callback(_ADS_ReportInteraction, 'tab_' + (n + 1));
      }
    </script>
